about_the_game:
You can have an erotic VR experience alone with a beautiful maid in an extravagant VIP room.
Using VR, you can enjoy game play with close contact without having to worry about the virus.
This VR game allows you to enjoy various perverted acts.

Controls:
You can touch her with your penis, urinate, and ejaculate.
You can change the outfits and the situation using the cubes.
Since you can move around freely, you can also see from the side and from the bottom.


Features:
You can touch and jiggle her breasts.
You can urinate and ejaculate as many times as you like without any restrictions.
Use the cube on the right to change the outfits.
Use the cube on the left to change the situation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
